channel.title: How did YOU get your internet name!?
channel.description:
I saw this thread on MPSC and thought I should post it here as well, hopefully you all don't mind.
Ever since I was a little kid I was [b]obsessed[/b] with rhyming, I did it whenever I could. So, as I began finding out about private servers I needed a name to stick with, one I could use no matter what server I played. It's quite funny actually, out of all the possible aliases I could have used, I came up with blueclueglue2. As time progressed I shortened it to glue2.

item.title: How did YOU get your internet name!?
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

lol wut, you dun goofed

Read full topic

item.title: How did YOU get your internet name!?
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

meh, i always wanted the name daniel, so i figured i could go by that on here.

item.title: How did YOU get your internet name!?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:12, topic:474616”][quote author=triston001 link=topic=592568.msg4226576#msg4226576 date=1361035254]
i would use my name as my username, but when it said i had to add numbers because “triston#” was taken, i added 001 because i figured it would be highly unlikely somebody already came up with that. and i’ve been right ever since. lustratio came from my Latin class, i liked the word lustratio which translates about to “purest”.
[/quote]

you said your name was daniel[/quote]busted

Read full topic
item.source: How did YOU get your internet name!?

item.title: How did YOU get your internet name!?
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

triston001:

i would use my name as my username, but when it said i had to add numbers because “triston#” was taken, i added 001 because i figured it would be highly unlikely somebody already came up with that. and i’ve been right ever since. lustratio came from my Latin class, i liked the word lustratio which translates about to “purest”.

you said your name was daniel

Read full topic

item.title: How did YOU get your internet name!?
item.dc:creator: @big_n12 big_n12
item.description:
@big_n12 wrote:

As my name IRL is Noah and I am extremely tall. Many people called me big as a nickname. So I always made it big_n12. The numbers were just there for ease since some websites require numbers in your name

Read full topic
